name: Flying Sparks
description:
You are a dwarven Blacksmith, making swords of all kind for your customers, but they want their sword exactly how the ordered it, and fast!

The Problem: some metals only get soft enough to work with at temperatures other metals already melt.

Can you serve your customers all at once and get those Coins like you deserve?

This Game was made in the VimJam3 Game Jam with the theme of "Turn up the Heat" and the Focus of "Multi-use" by Goldbeard Studios, consisting of coder TheTrueSCP and artist/gamedesigner MonsieurHannes

Texuture/Sound Credits
